thread.title: Adele to release new album called '25' on Nov. 20
thread.title_full: Adele to release new album called '25' on Nov. 20

author: senh
title: Adele to release new album called '25' on Nov. 20
text: BING NEWS: Adele to release new album called '25' on Nov. 20 NEW YORK (AP) — Adele will release the follow-up to her monumental "21" album on Nov. 20. The Grammy-winning singer said "25," her third album, will be preceded with the first single, "Hello." The song is being released Friday. Adele's "21," released in ... 10/22/2015 - 4:56 am | View Link Adele opens Instagram account and reveals album release date Adele's confirmation of her album release date comes just 24 hours after she released an emotional statement about her new music on Twitter, confirming that it will be called 25 and will be a "make-up record" that focuses on the point in her life where she ... 10/22/2015 - 4:27 am | View Link Adele confirms next album will be called 25, apologises to fans for absence Singer Adele has confirmed her new album will be called 25 in a revealing open letter to fans also ... Fans of the songstress have been salivating over her new album following the release of a 30-second teaser clip on British television over the weekend. 10/21/2015 - 9:58 pm | View Link Adele opens up about new album ‘25': It’s a 'make-up record’ British singer Adele announced Wednesday that her new album, her first in four years, would be called "25." "My last record was a ... which did not reveal a release date. "Making up for lost time. Making up for everything I ever did and never did," she ... 10/21/2015 - 9:09 pm | View Link Adele reveals new album will be called "25" Award-winning singer Adele reveals that her new album, the first in four years, will be called ''25''. Rollo Ross reports. U.S.
